front.title: Integrating Single-use Authentication Mechanisms with Kerberos

abstract.t: This document defines extensions to the Kerberos protocol specifi- cation [RFC1510] which provide a method by which a variety of single-use authentication mechanisms may be supported within the protocol. The method defined specifies a standard fashion in which the preauthentication data and error data fields in Kerberos mes- sages may be used to support single-use authentication mechanisms.
